<div style="height: 1.5em;"></div>

To me, ecology is integrative, interactive, and interdisciplinary. So besides these areas, and I am always open to cool ideas that spark my interests.

I have years of experience in statistical analysis and programming in R, and now I still keep arming myself with new quantitative skills. I highly value these "weapons"—they offer me the ability to tackle the research questions that intrigue me. Never stop learning!

I am also into data visualization: creating awesome ggplots for effective science communication definitely brings me a great sense of joy and achievement!
